WorkItem.Description:
In the latest build on EJ (4.0.13b), my Mage (Xzerqces - Kargath Realm) is showing only survivability in the gear display. No DPS bars are shown. It doesn't matter what I choose in the "Sort" pull-down, all the bars beneath are green survivability bars. I confirmed that Rawr correctly recognizes the toon as a Mage.
Â 
I have attached a screen capture jpg of what I am seeing with Rawr.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Results showing Survival and not DPS

Comments.Message: Try the following: go to Gear > trinket 1 chart and find Figurine - Jeweled Serpent. Right click and edit, this will open item editor. Edit the special effect in lower right and make sure cooldown is not 0 (it should be set to 120).
Wow! That worked. It was set to 0 for the cooldown. Thank you. Everything is working as it should now.

It didn't quite work for me.  Although I figured out that I had another trinket equipped that had its cooldown set to zero - Talisman of Resurgence.  So I think the proper step is to find the trinket or something else you have equipped that erroneous has its cooldown set to zero and fix it per the instructions given.
The trinkets should be almost entirely corrected in .14 so we shouldn't see this issue again.

The Figurine - Jeweled Serpent and the other Figurines also need to be marked as Unique even though it isn't in-game. It's obtained through a quest that you can only do once. Rawr was trying to equip it twice
5hat has been asked and answered several times. We won't be marking them unique in the default cache
